'''''Beyond Bree'' October 1985''' is an issue of ''[[Beyond Bree]]'', edited by [[Nancy Martsch]]. In his article, [[Taum Santoski]] provides a transcription of the [[elvish]] notes reproduced in ''[[Les aventures de Tom Bombadil]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Carl F. Hostetter]]|articleurl=http://www.elvish.org/resources.html#PrimaryBooks_anchor|articlename=Resources for Tolkienian Linguistics: An Annotated Guide|dated=|website=[http://www.elvish.org/ The Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]|accessed=10 January 2012}}</ref>
==Contents==
*"The Living Flower in its Casket" by Katherine Schroeder (ill.)
*"Homecoming, SR 1419" poem by Lee Garig
*"Tolkien-san, Yoku Irasshaimashitaf ... Some Observations on Similarities Between Japanese and the Elvish Languages of J.R.R. Tolkien" by [[Patrick H. Wynne|Patrick Wynne]]
*"The Nature of Eru" comments by Michael Fath & Steve Deyo
*"A Manuscript by J.R.R. Tolkien in the French edition of ''The Adventures of Tom Bombadil''" by [[Taum Santoski]]
*"The Stone of Erech" by Geoff Davies
*Publications, Letters, News<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.cep.unt.edu/bree/Back-Issues1.pdf|articlename=Back Issue Index: March 1981 - February 1991|dated=|website=[http://www.cep.unt.edu/bree.html Beyond Bree]|accessed=10 January 2012}}</ref>
{{references}}
